metadata.description: Brainstem coordination hubs orchestrating multisystem reflex interactions.
metadata.notes: Summarizes integrative reflex centers replacing the prior monolithic map.

swallowing.afferent: Glossopharyngeal and vagal afferents to nucleus tractus solitarius.
swallowing.integration: Swallowing central pattern generator linking nucleus ambiguus and reticular formation.
swallowing.efferent: Vagal, glossopharyngeal, trigeminal, and hypoglossal motor outputs.
swallowing.effector: Sequential oral, pharyngeal, and esophageal contractions moving bolus safely.

breathing_swallow_coupling.stimulus: Concurrent respiratory cycle and swallow initiation.
breathing_swallow_coupling.afferent: Respiratory stretch receptors and oropharyngeal sensory input.
breathing_swallow_coupling.integration: Brainstem gating ensuring swallow occurs during expiratory pause.
breathing_swallow_coupling.efferent: Respiratory motor neurons inhibited while swallow motor pattern proceeds.
breathing_swallow_coupling.effector: Brief apnea with protected airway during swallow.

vestibular_integration.stimulus: Head movement and body sway sensed by vestibular apparatus.
vestibular_integration.integration: Interconnection with cerebellum, ocular motor nuclei, and spinal tracts.
vestibular_integration.efferent: Signals dispatched to ocular, cervical, and postural effectors.
vestibular_integration.effector: Unified gaze and posture stabilization responses.

reticular_startle.afferent: Auditory, visual, and somatosensory inputs to pontine reticular formation.
reticular_startle.integration: Reticular circuitry distributing activation to cranial and spinal motor systems.
reticular_startle.efferent: Diffuse projections triggering axial and limb muscle activation.
reticular_startle.effector: Generalized startle posture with rapid readiness.
